snippet.title: Gran Turismo Concept 2002 Trailer 1
snippet.description:
This trailer is from PS2 Demo Disc Bonus Disc 4. I was given Bonus Disc 4. I don't know it's origins, but i guess from an Official Australian PlayStation Magazine issue.

This trailer is for Gran Turismo Concept 2002 Tokyo-Geneva.

Notes from Uploader:
This is my 2nd least favourite trailer of the disc.
I honestly think this is just Gran Turismo 3 standalone DLC before DLC became a thing. This and Gran Turismo 3 honestly look no different to me.
